name: Milotic
description: The Tender Pokémon. Milotic is said to be the most beautiful of all the Pokémon. It has the power to becalm such emotions as anger and hostility to quell bitter feuding.

abilities.name: Marvel Scale
abilities.description: This Pokémon's AC increase by 2 when suffering from a negative status condition.

abilities.name: Competitive
abilities.description: This Pokémon adds its proficiency bonus to damage rolls while poisoned, burned, confused, or paralyzed.

abilities.name: Cute Charm
abilities.description: Once per short rest, you can impose disadvantage on an enemy attack roll of your choice.
